main event: Air Force personnel reported an unidentified bright silver-colored object maneuvering in the sky near Santa Barbara, California.
interesting points: The object changed shapes multiple times: elliptical, rectangular, and circular.,It was observed for 10-15 minutes.,The object was about 40 feet in diameter and made no sound.,Witnesses reported it could not be identified as an aircraft, balloon, or any known aerial device.,Gerhard Voegl reported seeing similar silvery disc-shaped objects over several months in 1964.
sighted object: a bright luminous object and disc-shaped objects
witness description: Gerhard Voegl observed unusual objects in the sky multiple times in 1964.
